source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a blurry, atmospheric cityscape scenery shot, depicted in black and white as if viewed through a rain-streaked window. The out-of-focus background features the bright, indistinct lights of a city at night, creating a hazy and dreamlike quality. There is no main subject in the scene; the focus is intentionally placed on establishing a moody, nocturnal urban atmosphere rather than highlighting any specific element within the environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: no evidence shows its a scene "at night", dont describe it
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video does not provide clear evidence that the scene is set at night, so it would be more accurate to avoid describing it as such.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video does not provide clear evidence that the scene is set at night, so it would be more accurate to avoid describing it as such.

The out-of-focus background features bright, indistinct lights of a city, creating a hazy and dreamlike quality. There is no main subject in the scene; the focus is intentionally placed on establishing a moody urban atmosphere rather than highlighting any specific element within the environment.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly states that there is no main subject and that the video is entirely in black and white. The primary subject is the large, 3D text element reading "DREAMSCAPE," which is white with a purple and blue gradient on its top surface. The caption omits this central subject, as well as the smaller text elements reading "</disrupt>" and "fiction... from beyond," and the green text that appears in the bottom-left corner. The description should begin with the text as the main subject, detailing its appearance and the accompanying smaller text. It should also describe the transition where the text distorts and fades away to reveal the background, which is accurately described as a blurry, black-and-white cityscape.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video opens with the large, 3D text "DREAMSCAPE" centered on the screen. The text is white with a subtle purple and blue gradient along its top surface. It is accompanied by smaller text elements: "</disrupt>" is positioned above, and "fiction... from beyond" is below. In the bottom-left corner, green text appears as if being typed. The main "DREAMSCAPE" title then distorts and fades away, revealing the scene behind it. The background is a blurry, atmospheric cityscape shot, depicted in black and white as if viewed through a rain-streaked window. The out-of-focus scene features the bright, indistinct lights of a city at night, creating a hazy and moody urban atmosphere.
